statements: SELECT * FROM smart_meter_data;
SELECT id, energy_usage, timestamp FROM smart_meter_data;
SELECT energy_usage, timestamp, meter_id, id FROM smart_meter_data;
SELECT * FROM smart_meter_data WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT id, meter_id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM smart_meter_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, energy_usage FROM smart_meter_data WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT meter_id, energy_usage FROM smart_meter_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY meter_id ASC
SELECT * FROM smart_meter_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND energy_usage < 50 ORDER BY energy_usage DESC
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM smart_meter_data WHERE energy_usage BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT timestamp, energy_usage, meter_id FROM smart_meter_data WHERE meter_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM smart_meter_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT meter_id, timestamp FROM smart_meter_data WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT habit_description FROM consumption_habits WHERE meter_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM smart_meter_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT meter_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_usage FROM smart_meter_data GROUP BY meter_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_meter_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, energy_usage FROM smart_meter_data WHERE meter_id = 12345 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sd.id, ch.habit_description FROM smart_meter_data sd JOIN consumption_habits ch ON sd.meter_id = ch.meter_id WHERE sd.energy_usage < 50;
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_usage, MAX(energy_usage) AS max_usage FROM smart_meter_data;
SELECT meter_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM smart_meter_data GROUP BY meter_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100 ORDER BY total_records DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM smart_meter_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT energy_usage, timestamp, id FROM smart_meter_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM smart_meter_data;
SELECT timestamp, energy_usage FROM consumption_history WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_meter_data WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, energy_usage FROM smart_meter_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01'
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_name, first_name
SELECT timestamp, user_id, energy_usage FROM consumption_history WHERE energy_usage BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT user_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM consumption_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_energy_usage > 500
SELECT * FROM smart_meter_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT meter_id, energy_usage FROM smart_meter_data WHERE energy_usage > 100
SELECT timestamp, energy_usage FROM smart_meter_data WHERE meter_id = 3
SELECT * FROM household WHERE address LIKE '%Lane%'
SELECT MAX(habit_score) FROM consumption_habits
SELECT meter_id, energy_usage FROM smart_meter_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM household WHERE address LIKE '%Lane%' ORDER BY household_id DESC;
SELECT provider_id, name FROM energy_provider WHERE provider_id = 2;
SELECT household_id, habit_score FROM consumption_habits WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY habit_score DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM smart_meter_data JOIN household ON smart_meter_data.meter_id = household.household_id WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM SmartMeterData WHERE energy_usage > 100
SELECT id, meter_id, energy_usage FROM SmartMeterData ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT timestamp, energy_usage FROM SmartMeterData WHERE meter_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND energy_usage <= 50
SELECT id, energy_usage FROM SmartMeterData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM Meters WHERE installed_date < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT id, username, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM SmartMeterData;
SELECT location, installed_date FROM Meters WHERE installed_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT Users.username, ConsumptionHabits.habit_description FROM Users JOIN ConsumptionHabits ON Users.id = ConsumptionHabits.user_id WHERE Users.role = 'customer';
